inclusion.criterion: Presumed/Clinically apparent 2 or more acute unilateral rib fractures between T3-T9
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: B. Randomization procedure: Pharmacy will dispense 30mL of injectate which will be randomized in block of 10 to either the SAPB group (30mL of 0.25% bupivacaine with epinephrine) or sham group (30mL of normal saline).
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: C. Injection: Patient consent will be obtained and time out will be performed on all patients.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: D. Slow Vital Capacity (SVC) Measurement: SVC will be performed using spirometer that has been internally validated
exclusion.label: unknown
